version_description:
Happy holidays! Update now and enjoy the presents:

A NEW CLASS: BOUNTY HUNTER
- Earn Diamond Dust with every multiplayer kill.
- All-new experimental weapons! Tomorrow’s firepower is in your hands – including the awe-inspiring Railgun!
- W

Spring comes bearing Modern Combat 5 news:

NEW MATCHMAKING SYSTEM
• Our improved multiplayer matchmaking system will ensure the odds are as even as possible by matching you against users of roughly the same skill.

WEAPON UPGRADES
• Imp

**WHAT'S NEW**

CUSTOM LOBBIES
• By popular demand, you can now create your own game room!
• Invite the friends you want to play with and enjoy the action without affecting your stats.

2 NEW ARMOR SETS
• Ronin: This ancient Japanes

**HOTFIXed
• Added game mode selection in ranked game
• Stability improvements

NEW CLASS: Sapper
Brings a totally new approach to the game
Deploys turrets in order to dominate the battlefield
Gathers dropped weapons for their parts to boost his arsenal

NEW Map: Showdown – Smaller in both size and number of players, Showdown will ensure skill will thrive over sheer power of numbers.
New Game Mode – New 1v1 or 2v2 game mode. Duels can only be fought on the Showdown map.
New High Roller Duel – Place
Minor bugs fixed
